resources.string: Official residence of the Head of the Republic of Tatarstan; a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 2000 and a cultural heritage site of Russia of federal significance. The main city attraction and “calling card” of Kazan.
The main juma mosque of the Republic of Tatarstan and the city of Kazan (since 2005), located on the territory of the Kazan Kremlin. One of the main attractions of the city.
Headquarters of the Ministry of Agriculture and Food of the Republic of Tatarstan
A system of lakes located within the city limits of Kazan.
One of the historical parts and complex attractions in the center of Kazan
